messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Tami Labig-Duquette"
<labigduquette@h...> wrote:
> I am in Dunkirk(close to Muncie), our children are 12,10 and 7yo.
> We could meet at the indy childrens museum as we are planning on
going one
> week end. Not sure what date but could let you know if your
interested!?
> Tami
>
>
> >From: HEM-Editor@h...
> >Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@y...
> >To: Unschooling-dotcom@y...
> >Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: melanie in indiana
> >Date: Fri, 27 Apr 2001 08:00:34 -0700
> >
> >Hi Mary. I'm in Greenwood - about 15 miles south of Indy. I do
not
> >know of anyone in my area that unschools, though there are quite a
> >few school-at-homers. My kids are still young (4 and 1). Sorry I
> >couldn't be much help.
> >
> >Melanie (in Indiana :))
> >
> >
> >--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., danmary@i... wrote:
> > > Melanie,
> > >
> > > Hi! I am new to home/un schooling and have been looking
for
> > > people who unschool in indiana and have not had much luck
finding
> > > anyone. Where in Indiana do u live? Do you know of any
unschooling
> > > support groups in IN? I live in Danville which is about 15
miles
> >due
> > > west of Indy. Looking forward to hearing from you.
> > >
> > > Mary
> Tami and melanie,

I familiar with both areas. I grew up in Marion and just
moved from the southside about 18 months ago. Tami let me know when
you plan to be at the museum. our next few weekends are kinda busy
but we may be able to work something out. My children are younger
than yours, 7, 5 and 2. But it would be nice to hear how things have
gone for you so far. Thanks.,


Mary

messages.messageBody:
I am in Dunkirk(close to Muncie), our children are 12,10 and 7yo.
We could meet at the indy childrens museum as we are planning on going one
week end. Not sure what date but could let you know if your interested!?
Tami

messages.subject: Re: melanie in indiana
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Mary.  I m in Greenwood - about 15 miles south of Indy.  I do not know of anyone in my area that unschools, though there are quite a few school-at-homers.
messages.messageBody:
Hi Mary. I'm in Greenwood - about 15 miles south of Indy. I do not
know of anyone in my area that unschools, though there are quite a
few school-at-homers. My kids are still young (4 and 1). Sorry I
couldn't be much help.

Melanie (in Indiana :))


--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., danmary@i... wrote:

>

> anyone. Where in Indiana do u live? Do you know of any unschooling
> support groups in IN? I live in Danville which is about 15 miles
due
> west of Indy. Looking forward to hearing from you.

> Mary

messages.subject: melanie in indiana
messages.msgSnippet: Melanie, Hi!  I am new to home/un schooling and have been looking for people who unschool in indiana and have not had much luck finding anyone.  Where in
messages.messageBody:
Melanie,

Hi! I am new to home/un schooling and have been looking for
people who unschool in indiana and have not had much luck finding
anyone. Where in Indiana do u live? Do you know of any unschooling
support groups in IN? I live in Danville which is about 15 miles due
west of Indy. Looking forward to hearing from you.

Mary
